labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: No such message is present, allowing you to DM them
data.expected_result: A message saying you cannot message a user you have blocked should appear
data.short_description: You can message users you've blocked in the Overlay
data.steps_to_repro: - Block a user and open a DM with them - Open the Overlay in a game - Go into the blocked user's DM in the Overlay and observe
